title: Connected
desc: Set in the distant future, Connected is a story about survival and greed with a post apocalyptic wasteland as its backdrop.

title: Connected Killer
desc: Jeff is bullied at school and online. It all becomes too much, and then the tables are turned on the bullies.

title: 大数据时代
